title: I didn't know ghusl was required for janabah Are my past prayers valid #islam #quran assim al hakeem
transcript: so my question was I was like uh 12 to 15 years old uh when I was impure I didn't know I have to do B to perform Wu I thought Wasing the private part was the only part so I perform namas till I think 15 years I'm 16 now so I now know that if you emplo you have to do Gul and I now I do G so is my prayer valid for the last players which I paid in impurity yes it is valid because it is valid because you were ignorant of the ruling ask Allah for forgiveness and move on inshallah
